SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface ServerGameView

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerGame
public interface ServerGameView
Read-only object which represent an in-progress game, as seen by the server.

Compared to the client, the server can see: - the list of tiles still in the bag getBagView() In addition, it returns ServerPlayerView and ServerCommonGoalView instead of PlayerView and CommonGoalView instances.

See Also:
